messages.content: What is the purpose of ComfyUI-SAI_API?
ComfyUI-SAI_API includes nodes for all the v2 (Stable Image) routes listed at https://platform.stability.ai, allowing users to access Stability API functionality within ComfyUI.
How can you add your API key for ComfyUI-SAI_API?

You can add your API key for ComfyUI-SAI_API by setting the environment variable 'SAI_API_KEY', writing it to a file named 'sai_platform_key.txt', or entering it in the 'api_key_override' field of each node.
What is the license for ComfyUI-SAI_API?
ComfyUI-SAI_API is licensed under the MIT License (MIT).

No, the MIT License provides the software 'AS IS', without warranty of any kind, express or implied.
Are the authors or copyright holders liable for any damages arising from the use of ComfyUI-SAI_API?
No, under the MIT License, the authors or copyright holders are not liable for any claim, damages, or other liability arising from the use of the software.
